definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: I just came from a fruit market.
sentences.chinese: 我刚从一个水果市场来。

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 还可吃一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸气的饮料。

sentences.english: They had pears in white wine, with a piece of fruitcake.
sentences.chinese: 他们吃着白葡萄酒腌泡过的梨子，配着水果蛋糕。

sentences.english: The bulk of our nutritional needs come from fruits, vegetables, and grains.
sentences.chinese: 我们所需的营养大部分都来自于水果，蔬菜和谷物。

sentences.english: The fruit crop was now in.
A vendor rests next to watermelons at a fruit market in Hangzhou, east China's Zhejiang province May 16, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 浙江杭州一水果市场里，小贩在成堆的西瓜旁小憩。

sentences.english: When the fruit rotates, the peeling function is realized.
sentences.chinese: 当水果转动起来后，就实现了削皮功能。

sentences.english: The fruit cake has tantalized the world for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 几个世纪以来，水果蛋糕都是诱人的美味。

sentences.english: These fruit knives are very good for stripping apple skins off.
sentences.chinese: 这种水果刀削苹果皮很好用。

sentences.english: He swallowed all of the food, including the fruit.
sentences.chinese: 他把所有的食物都吞了下去，包括水果。

sentences.english: "Carnival of National Day " was staged in Changsha Windows of the World on Sept. 29.
sentences.chinese: 9月29日，游客在长沙世界之窗参加水果花车巡游。

sentences.english: I brought out some fruit but nobody wanted them.
sentences.chinese: 我抬出一些水果来，但是没有人想要。

sentences.english: I believed that branded fruit owns higher quality than non-branded one.
sentences.chinese: 我相信品牌水果的品质会比没牌子得好。

sentences.english: Cantaloup is a large fruit, and it grows on sandy soil.
sentences.chinese: 香瓜是一种大型的水果，而它生长在沙土上。

sentences.english: Ample and complex on the palate. It reveals fresh and generous fruit.
sentences.chinese: 口感饱满复杂，带有浓郁的新鲜水果味。

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
